entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
